column1: Master of Science in Corporate Governance and Compliance (MScCGC)
column5: OverviewThe mission of the MSc in Corporate Governance and Compliance is to provide specialised training and practical knowledge to prepare directors, company secretaries and compliance professionals for strengthening the sustainability and accountability of their organisations. The School of Business aims to achieve all that with an expert teaching team and an innovative curriculum.Students will receive an all-rounded education in corporate governance to meet the challenges of an increasingly complex regulatory environment and ever-rising expectation of shareholders and stakeholders.
